ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Friends

Class Friend

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.User.User
      • ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Friends.Friend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable

    public class Friend
extends User
    Class representing a friend of a user. All friends are users and therefore have all attributes and methods of a user. Friends have an additional attribute to specify if they are tracked, and they have methods to view and modify their tracking status.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.User.User

    • Constructor Detail

      • Friend

        public Friend()
        Default constructor. Runs the default constructor of User, initializing all of the friend's attributes to empty objects. By default, the tracked status is False.

      • Friend

        public Friend(FriendsList friendsList,
      Inventory inventory,
      NotificationManager notificationManager,
      UserProfile profile,
      TrackedFriendsList trackedFriends,
      TradeManager tradeManager,
      java.lang.Boolean isTracked)
        Constructor that uses all the attributes of User. Initializes the Friend using these attributes (using User's constructor), then sets the tracked status.
        Parameters:
        friendsList - the user's list of Friends
        inventory - the user's inventory
        notificationManager - the user's notification manager
        profile - the user's profile
        trackedFriends - a list of the user's tracked friends
        tradeManager - the user's trade manager
        isTracked - Boolean representing the friend's tracking status

      • Friend

        public Friend(java.lang.String username)
        Constructor that sets only the username of the Friend. All other attributes are initialized using the default constructor of User (to empty objects).
        Parameters:
        username - the friend's username

    • Method Detail

      • isTracked

        public java.lang.Boolean isTracked()
        Returns the tracked status of the friend as a Boolean.
        Returns:
        True if the friend is tracked; False otherwise

      • setIsTracked

        public void setIsTracked(java.lang.Boolean isTracked)
        Sets the tracked status of the friend to the specified Boolean value. This method is used when adding and removing a friend from a TrackedFriendsList.
        Parameters:
        isTracked - Boolean representing the tracking status of the friend

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
